entities.name: signs
entities.description: The text mentions 'any of the signs' which refers to physical entities that can be seen. The description is supported by the excerpt: 'them could see any of the signs he described'.

entities.name: humans
entities.description: The text mentions 'humans' which refers to living entities. The description is supported by the excerpt: 'telling them that humans'.

relationships.description: The text implies a relationship between signs and humans where humans can see the signs. The description is supported by the excerpt: 'them could see any of the signs he described'.
